turns.user_message: I'm trying to find information about a particular restaurant called Ian Hong house.
turns.agent_response: our records don't show that hotel. sorry

turns.user_message: Are you sure you don't have anything on Ian Hong House? I need the address and postcode.
turns.agent_response: Yes, I am sure. There is no Ian Hong House restaurant in our system.
turns.reasoning: Continues Goal 1 (restaurant info). Agent confirms no info found

turns.user_message: Can you please check again? lan hong house.
turns.agent_response: Sorry about that! I found the Lan Hong House at 12 Norfolk Street City Centre, cb12lf. It's a moderately-priced Chinese restaurant.
turns.reasoning: Still Goal 1 (restaurant info). Agent finally provides correct restaurant details

turns.user_message: Great, thanks so much. Can I also get help booking a room at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel please?

turns.user_message: I would like to book a taxi from the hong house to the hotel leaving by 10:15
turns.agent_response: No problem.  I booked a red audi that will pick you up by 10:15.
turns.reasoning: New Goal 3: Taxi booking. User switches to transportation domain

turns.agent_response: Have a great trip!  Thank you for contacting us for all your booking needs.  Enjoy your trip!
turns.reasoning: General thank you for all services. Not a new goal

turns.user_message: One more thing. Can you please give me the taxi contact number.
turns.agent_response: Sure!  The contact number is 07686386258.  The car will be a red Audi.
turns.reasoning: Follow-up question about taxi (Goal 3). Requesting additional details about same service

turns.user_message: Thank you very much. Have a great day.
turns.agent_response: No problem, have a great day!
turns.reasoning: Final thank you. Not a new goal
